name: Don't Skip the Leg Day
description:
Hey you, champ!
Don't miss the leg day.
or
get ready to glide with thin spaghetti legs.
Develop bottom parts of your body. Use these sections to pass different obstacles.
So you can leg press, or literally just walk like a king/queen.
This game will make you addictive to your leg days.
Just play it. Ok?
publishers: ZERO SUM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
